strInstructions: Pour the Jack Daniel s Tennessee whiskey Jim Beam bourbon whiskey dry gin and Absolut vodka into a highball glass half filled with ice cubes. Add Squirt and serve.

Mix all ingredients together over ice in a highball glass. Shake up then top with sprite and serve.

In a tall mixing glass combine all ingredients. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass rimmed with sugar.
In a tall mixing glass filled with ice add 1800 Silver Tequila and all ingredients. Shake vigorously and serve in a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a slice of grapefruit. . .
In a tall mixing glass filled with ice add 1800 Silver Tequila and all ingredients. Shake vigorously and serve in a chilled margarita glass. Or mix it up and serve it blended. . .

1 Pour in the first shot of melon liqueur Midori . 2 Pour in one shot of Everclear . 3 Pour in one can of 7 up or less if desired . 4 Top off with the final shot of melon liqueur Midori

This drink is served on the rocks. . . Add vodka orange juice grapefruit juice lime and lemon juice to the glass. Give it a good stir to make sure flavors mix. . . Top off the drink with champagne and serve. . . I recommend using Tropicana OJ with Calcium added. It s the best I ve tried. . . Note that cheap champagne will work wonderfully in this drink You don t need to go out and spend lots of money.

The ratios can be changed depending on how strong you want it but I find this has a relatively solid balance. Both guys and girls will really enjoy this.

strDrink: A Crow Left of the Murder recipe

Chill in a mixing tin and pour.

Rotate glass with each sip so that sugar is always obtained with drink. You should have finished the sugar when you ve finished the drink.

Shake strain into glass.

Just before presentation flame the drink. As the Sambuca burns the cinnamon will sparkle. A dazzling effect if the bartender or server is walking with the drink while it s burning give the comet a tail . .

strDrink: Boston s Green Monster Mc recipe

strInstructions: Pour the vermouth brandy orange bitters lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

The easy way to make this drink is to add all listed ingredients with ice into shaker and strain into glass. . . However the really slick way is much more impressive . . Add cranberry juice lime juice triple sec and only one ounce vodka into shaker with ice. Strain into glass. Then mix 1 once orange juice with one ounce vodka in a seperate glass. . . Fill a turkey baister with the vodka OJ mix and slowly inject it into the cranberry glass on the bottom. . . This produces a sort of reverse layering effect and also ensures both cranberry and OJ will have the same amount of vodka.

Combine ingredients in a coffee mug. Top with whipped cream and coconut shavings.
Combine ingredients in a coffee mug. Top with whipped cream.

Same as caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add white rum. It s great

Add the pineapple chunks to a highball glass. Pour in grenadine fill with wine and serve.
Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a celery stick or a hot pepper
Pour Southern Comfort and Bourbon over rocks in a 12 ounce glass. Add a dash of tabasco or any non habe ero pepper sauce dont go overboard . To really impress garnish with a jumbo shrimp.
Garnish with jalapeno pepper.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass. Add a dash of garlic powder on top.
Pour the rum triple sec grenadine and bitters into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with champagne stir and serve.
Fill glass with ice. Add vanilla vodka with ginger ale.
Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

Shake or roll. Garnish with an orange slice.
Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon twist or an orange slice.

strDrink: Call of the Snowfields Lumikenttien Kutsu recipe
strInstructions: Blend with ice and pour into cocktail glass. Sprinkle grated nutmeg on top.

Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.
Pour into an old fashioned glass half filled with broken ice. Add a twist of lemon and serve.

Pour into an old fashioned glass half filled with broken ice and serve.
Pour peach schnapps into flute then fill with champagne.

Wash some ice. Put into glass. Dump the booze in o er the ice. Get your water in there right after that. Squeeze that bit o lime into it stir toss the rind afterward. Don t try to be fancy. Just hand it to your miss or your mate and say AARrr there ya be Enjoy

Stir. No garnish.

Make a simple syrup by boiling the sugar water and mint sprigs until sugar is dissolved and it begins to boil. Pour out one cup of bourbon to make room for syrup. Strain Mint sprigs out of syrup and pour into bottle of Bourbon. Mix the contents and put in the deep freeze until it thickens. Serve on the rocks and enjoy. . . You can take a couple extra sprigs of mint and put them in the bottle. Also it s not necessary to use a high quality Bourbon for this to work Evan Williams works just fine.

Pour the whisky and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Fill with club soda and stir again briefly. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.
Pour vermouth and gin into a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.
Pour the port into a pint glass half filled with ice cubes. Add the sambuca followed by the WKD and serve.
Blend all ingredients and pour into champagne flute. Add a small piece of edible dry ice.
Shake well and pour in a cocktail glass frosted with strawberry.
Layer both ingredients in a cocktail glass and serve.
Stir over ice cubes in an aperitif or cordial glass and squeeze in an orange wedge. Serve.
Shake ingredients except wine in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a wine glass and top with the sparkling white wine.
Chill all ingredients as well as an 8 oz wine glass prior to serving. Pour vodka and maraschino liqueur into the glass and fill with champagne. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Stir the Stoli raspberry vodka Bailey s irish cream and half and half with ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with maraschino liqueur and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Shake all but the lemonade and strain into an ice filled highball glass. Fill with lemonade.
Serve shaken not stirred.
Add all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.
Fill glass with ice pour in vodka fill remainder of the glass with Red Bull and just a splash of blue curaco. Stir with a straw.
Chill the teaspoon amounts of liquor in a mixing glass and strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne add strips of orange peel and serve.
Put sugar in glass. Squeeze limes into glass. Stir slightly. Add rum. Add lemonade. Stir and serve.
Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with flamed orange peel and serve.

Fill a collins glass with ice. Add 1 ounce of vodka and .5 ounces of triple sec. Fill with cranberry juice leaving about an inch of space for a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of lime on the rim of the glass and place one thin straw into the glass.
Pour ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with ice. Stir strain into a chilled old fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.
Mix all ingredients together over ice. Add a wedge of lime and enjoy
Combine ingredients in a wine glass and serve.
Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass. Garnish with two maraschino cherries and serve.
Stir all ingredients together in a lowball or old fashioned glass and serve.
Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.
Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Shake ingredients with shaved ice strain over ice in an old fashioned glass and serve.
Stir all ingredients in a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

Thaw the two cans of limeade until they are liquid. In the party punch bowl mix the limeade rum and cointreau. Slice in the fresh lime and muddle it with the punch. Throw in the ice and stir again. Taste and optionally dilute with ice water or soda water. Serves 4 serious cocktail drinkers or about a dozen pre dinner guests.

Shake the tennessee whiskey lemon juice simple syrup and Cointreau in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and fill to taste with club soda. Garnish with fruit slices and serve.
Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass and roll back and forth to gently mix. Strain into a large goblet or pint glass over ice and serve.

strDrink: Dale s Long Island Iced Tea recipe
strInstructions: Shake all the ingredients except the cola with ice and strain into a collins glass filled 3 4 with ice. Top with coke and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Drizzle the chocolate syrup into an old fashioned glass coating the edges and leaving a pool of chocolate in the base of the glass. Pour the contents of the cocktail shaker through a strainer into the chocolate lined glass and serve.
Stir ingredients together in an old fashioned glass 1 4 filled with ice cubes.
Pour advocaat rum and vodka into a shaker with ice. Shake well pour over ice in a highball glass and top with lemonade.
In a highball glass with ice pour three shots of Rum preferably Bacardi one shot of Kahlua a shot of ginger ale and fill the rest of the glass with milk Homo or 2 never SKIM Stir. That s It Enjoy

Add ice to the hurricane glass. Add the liquor and fill almost to the top with sweet and sour then add a splash of sprite. Mix by pouring the drink into a mixing glass then back into the hurricane glass. Add a lemon as a garnish.
Pour the sprite and then the shot of Aftershock. Mix and enjoy.
Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
In a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes combine the rum dubonnet and dry vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.
Pour all ingredients into a shaker cup. Add ice last. Stir ingredients do not shake unless asked to . Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.
Pour ingredients into an iced mixing glass. Serve on rocks.

strDrink: Dance With A Dream Cocktail recipe
strInstructions: In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Pour the Blackbeard s spiced rum into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with cranberry juice and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve.
Pour vermouth gin and cherry brandy into a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes and stir. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour the captain into the glass and fill with root beer.

Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Add water to taste if required. Rim a margarita glass with sugar if desired. Pour the blended drink mixture into the margarita glass and serve.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a sword and cherry on the rim.
Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a glass with ice cubes and garnish with a twist of lemon.
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of both lemon and orange peel and serve.
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a sherry glass.
Combine ingredients in a shaker with slices of lime and cracked ice. Shake hard and well then strain into a chilled martini glass. The pulp from the lime slices will act as the garnish. Serve.
First two shots of Vodka then the lime juice. Add ice. Top up the glass with Coke.

Pour the gin cherry heering kirsch lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Gently stir in the soda sparkling water. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a slice of lime.
Shake ingredients with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with an olive and serve.
Build over ice in a highball glass.
Pour into a heat proof cup and serve immediately.
Build over ice in a rocks glass. Squeeze the lime wedge into the drink before dropping in.
Wash an old fashioned glass with bitters and ice. Discard excess. Add vermouth whiskey and wine. Top with lemonade to taste and serve.
Stir all ingredients together in an old fashioned glass and serve.

Take a martini glass and rim with sugar. Then draw a pentagram in the glass with the chocolate syrup. Combine the liquor and one splash of 7up over ice and shake. Pour carefully into the very center of the martini glass to not upset the syrup design. When finished add another splash of 7up for effervescence. Garnish with a chocolate covered strawberry and serve.
Pour the vodka curacao and Midori melon liqueur into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda to taste and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour ingredients as listed into a Collins glass filled with ice.
Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.
Let the mexican hot chocolate cool to room temperature. Pour all of the ingredients into an irish coffee glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well.
Pour rum over ice add ginger ale and stir. . . NOTE You can substitute any dark or spiced rum.
Pour rum into a tall glass over ice. Pour ginger beer over it. Squeeze in lime and drop slice in. Serve.

Fill pre chill a tall glass by filling with ice and water. Let sit for a moment. . . Toss out water and ice fill with fresh ice. . . To this add 2 oz s of Gosling s Black Seal Rum. . . To this top with Barretts Ginger Beer. Ginger ale will not work. For this drink to succeed use a strong almost bitter ginger beer. . . Squeeze 1 4 lime into the libation. . . Top with freshly grated nutmeg. Do not use powdered nutmeg. . . Stir with a slice of fresh ginger and serve. . . Prepare more glasses ...seconds and thirds may be ordered if it s a hot day.
Mix ingredients together in a highball glass 3 4 filled with ice cubes and serve.
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into snifter.
Pour ingredients as listed above into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a Cherry.

Pour the rum Kahlua vermouth and lemon into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a Champagne flute over crushed ice. Top with Coca cola. Garnish with a lemon slice and serve.
Blend all ingredients. Pour into poco grande glass.
Pour the blue curacao and grenadine into a highball glass. Fill with pineapple flavored wine to taste and stir. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.
Mix all ingredients with ice. Strain and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive.

Combine equal amounts of both ingredients. Serve cold to very cold in wine glass or similar elegant presentation. . . NOTE Mountain Dew Pitch Black original OR sour type II may be used but sour II gives a better effect.
Pour vodka into the milk. Add chocolate flavoring as desired and serve.
Mix like ordinary drink and serve with ice.

There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use but I prefer Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic most people prefer the drink without Tonic . Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.
Blend and drink until sober

Pour all ingredients except Jagermeister into a collins glass filled with ice. Then fill rest of glass with Jagermeister depending on your collins glass this can be more or less than 2 shots. Be sure to add enough grenadine to make it nice and red like the villain we love to hate.
Pour vodka Gin Tequila Triple sec and rum into a Collins glass filled with ice then top with 1 2 oz.Jaegermeister.
Serve in a highball glass filled with ice with a lemon and lime slice on brim of glass.
Put all ingredients in a blender and mix. Or simply pour ingredients over ice in a glass.
Mix all whiskey together and top off with orange juice.

Add the Kahlua coffee liqueur Tia Maria coffee liqueur Cointreau and milk to a blender. Blend for 5 seconds and pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice. Layer whipped cream on top garnish with a half strawberry and serve.
Shake all ingredients except cola and strain into an ice filled highball glass. Add cola garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry and serve.
Mix the blue curacao peach schnapps and orange juice together in a mixing glass. Pour over crushed ice in an old fashioned glass or large cocktail glass and serve.
In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Mix in the order cacao menthe whiskey milk. Try to keep the layers separate. Float on the back of a spoon tilt the glass and pour very gently etc. . . I suggest tilting the glass. When you tilt the glass you can when pouring the cream milk rotate the glass causing the cream to swirl down through the other layers which looks good. Serve in an apertif glass.
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into an old fashioned glass with ice.
Blend ingredients in a blender. Serve in cocktail glasses.
Shake and strain into an old fashioned glass three quarters filled with broken ice. Add cola and serve.
Pour the Licor 43 into a shaker then the milk and then the orange juice. The egg is optional but add it in if you want. Shake everything jeje but shake it well pour in a glass with lots of ice.

In cocktail mixer filled with ice combine all ingredients. Shake or stir strain into rocks glass or large shot glass. . . Tip If the right amount of grenadine is used it should be the color of orange sherbert.
Stir ingredients together well in a mixing glass half filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.
Pour vanilla vodka into ice filled glass. Add triple sec. Add soda to taste. Mix with straw.
Measure a full highball glass of crushed ice into cocktail shaker. Add ingredients and shake. Pour mixture into highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.
Shake all ingredients except champagne in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a wine glass and fill with champagne. Add a couple of ice cubes.
Shake ingredients with ice and strain over ice cubes in a chilled cocktail glass.
Pour ingredients into a tall glass over ice stir and serve.
Pour the coconut rum banana liqueur orange juice and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add a dash of grenadine around the inside edge of the glass and serve.
Shake creme de menthe creme de cacao and milk with ice cubes in a shaker. Pour into a cocktail glass and add a dash of aftershock. Do not stir.
Pour all ingredients into an old fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Pour vodka into glass. Add cordial until colour becomes light red. Add coke until definite colour change occurs. Drink.
Shake and strain into an ice filled old fashioned glass.

Pour the Malibu rum and Kahlua into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.
Pour vodka vermouth and Cointreau into a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass half filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass garnish with an orange twist and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings and serve.

Mix 3 tablespoons Oreo cookie crumbs available in most groceries in baking isle plus 1 tablesoon powdered sugar on a flat plate. Coat rim of chilled cocktail Martini glass with lime and then dip rim of glass in Oreo mixture. Set aside. . . Mix Godiva liqueur creme de cacao vodka and half and half into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into the set aside cocktail glass. Serve.
Combine ingredients in a plastic cup. Garnish with oreos and chocolate shavings.
Mix absinthe with the aftershock then add the pernod and drink straight down stick to 1 to 2 any more in one session and your likely to wake up and not remember a thing.
Mix all ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Strain into an old fashioned glass.
In a freezingly chilled glass pour in Bacardi 151 and gin. Now light the drink on fire be extra careful After a few seconds of burning the drink pour in the coke and serve.
Pour vodka schnapps and lime juice into a glass. Add orange juice until the glass is half filled and fill completely with 7 up. Stir well and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir briefly and serve.
Pour all the ingredients into a large blender. Blend with enough ice to give the cocktail the consistency of a frozen margarita. Pour into a margarita glass and garnish as you see fit.
Pour in cup and stir.

Combine the sugar cinnamon and cocoa and rim the edge of a chilled cocktail glass with it. Drizzle chocolate syrup around the inside of the glass. Fill a shaker 1 3 full of ice and add creme de cacao white chocolate liqueur vodka and cream. Shake well and strain into the glass. Garnish with cherries and top with a puff of whipped cream and chocolate shavings.
Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Stir ingredients together to chill strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Put equal parts of everything except whipped cream into shaker mix over ice. Strain into the glass. Use whipped cream as a garnish.

Pour the vodka and liqueurs in the above order into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir the ingrediens and fill up with soda water and sprite. Squeeze a lime wedge over optional but make sure to use one as garnish and serve.
Pour both ingredients into an old fashioned glass stir briefly and serve.

Pour the gin cranberry juice maraschino liqueur lemon juice and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with gin infused cranberries and serve.
Stir vodka and blue curacao together with ice in a glass. Top with champagne and drop a blue maraschino cherry to the bottom.
Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Mix the vodka peach schnapps and Red Bull together in a collins glass. Add a small amount of curacao until the mixture is a deep green. Add some ice and pour the remainder of the curacao down the side of the glass to leave a blue layer at the base of the glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice and then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a couple of whole coffee beans and serve.
In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Build over ice in a highball glass.
Fill a hurricane glass with ice then add the Kahlua coffee liqueur Bailey s Irish cream and butterscotch schnapps. Add half and half as desired. For less cream put in an old fashioned glass.
Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half filled with cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Stir all ingredients together in a mixing glass half filled with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Pour the contents into a highball glass and serve.

Mix pineapple juice and molasses well either shake or blend stirring won t work. Pour into glass and drop rum on top but do not stir in. Splash on cherry syrup and garnish with a pineapple wedge or pineapple chunks. . . Serve slightly cooler than room temp or over ice.
Pour gin and blue curacao into an ice filled collins glass. Add lemon juice pineapple juice and soda. Stir and garnish with a long lemon twist a cherry and mint leaves.
Pour in amaretto and rum on the rocks then add 7 up. Stir and serve.
Shake well over crushed ice in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice.

Mix all drinks in a blender You can add 8 cubes of ice to chill the drink and give it more of a body. Add the hot melting butter or the schnapps right before you drink. Makes enough for at least 10 people.
Put a few ice cubes in a highball glass. Add the J germeister and Windsor stir then fill the glass with the 7 Up and give it a small stir.
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes and shake. Pour into a collins glass filled with ice and serve.
Stir ingredients together in an old fashioned glass and serve.
Add brandy to glass and fill with lemonade. Add ice if desired. Stir.
Add all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or serve on the rocks.
Mix blue curacao with rum and ice. Pour it into a glass and add the rest of the ingredients slowly. Garnish with a piece of peach a cherry and a piece of celery.
Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist and serve.
Add gin cointreau and lemon juice to an ice filled shaker. Shake for 30 seconds and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve.
Mix all ingredients except sprite. Pour into a highball glass over ice cubes and fill with sprite. Garnish with red cherry and lime wheel.

Place ice in blender add remaining items and mix well into a slushi. Pour into a large glass of 16 oz or more hurricane glass is recommended. Top drinks with whipped topping and a whole cherry and drizzle coco syrup over whipped topping. Add a large straw into glass preferably a large plastic flex straw. Maybe strong tasting due to Kamora so you can dilute mix with vodka if desired.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a sour glass.
Stir all ingredients except lemon peel with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
In a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes combine the gin brandy sweet vermouth dry vermouth and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

Pour the scotch whisky Southern Comfort lime juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker half filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a fresh slice of peach and serve.
Mix ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass over ice and serve.

Fill collins glass with ice. Add Aliz and coconut rum then fill with equal amounts of cranberry and pineapple juice leaving space for the 151 rum to float on top. Shake ingredients before adding the 151 rum. Garnish with sliced pineapples and cherries on a toothpick.
Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.
Shake lemonade and Everclear in a cocktail shaker with ice. Add grenadine and tabasco sauce. Strain into glass.
Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour a shot of vodka over ice. Fill with Ocean Spray White Cranberry juice and stir.
Combine ingredients in an old fashioned glass.

Blend the absolut kurant oregat and frangelico in a mixer. Pour in highball glass add 2 ice cubes fill with the cranberry juice and sprite. Put a slice of lemon on the edge of the glass. . . Optional add a dash of lime for an even fresher taste.
Fill a mason jar with ice. Pour over the whiskey Jim Beam . Then add the Pepsi and Mountain Dew. Mix if desired.
Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into an old fashioned glassh half filled with ice cubes and serve.
Pour the Vodka Pernod Malibu Tia Maria into a one pint beer glass add the lemonade and pineapple juice and top up with coke.
Stir gin and peach bitters or peach brandy in a cordial glass. Add an olive and a mint leaf and serve.
Blend all ingredients with 1 2 cup shaved ice in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.
Combine all ingredients except water with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice cubes in a chilled collins glass. Fill with sparkling water and stir gently.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Pour the anejo rum bourbon whiskey creme de cacao Drambuie and hot coffee into an Irish coffee cup or glass. Pour the cream carefully over the back of a teaspoon on top of the drink so that it floats and serve.
Stir ingredients together over ice in a highball glass and serve.
Build ingredients except ginger ale in a highball glass over ice and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with orange peel and a cherry and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass stir well and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice. Top with grenadine and serve.
Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel and serve.
Serve on the rocks. . . Optional garnish lemon or lime twist.
Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drizzle with chocolate sauce and serve.
Shake ingredients with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh blackberries and serve.

Using a lime juicer squeeze the juice of two whole limes into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the dry vermouth and top off with ginger ale. Stir until all ingredients are mixed. Garnish with a wedge of lime and serve.
Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir until well mixed and serve.

Add frozen limeade concentrate in blender fill the same can with vodka and add to blender fill can with Half and Half and add to blender along with 6 ice cubes. Blend pulse until ice is crushed. Pour into any type of glass.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with cracked ice. Shake well and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a green maraschino cherry and a sprig of mint.
Combine all ingredients in an old fashioned or lowball glass ignite extinguish and serve.
Mix with ice in a tall glass.
Build over ice in a double old fashioned glass.
Stir well over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass add a twist of lemon peel and serve.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a collins glass with ice.
Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well strain over ice cubes in a glass and serve.
Pour ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.
Using a large glass of water add lemonade concentrate to taste best to make it a little stronger than usual . Add the shots of everclear and mix well.
Stir ingredients together in a mixing tin. Pour over ice cubes in an old fashioned rocks or lowball glass and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a champagne flute or 6 oz glass and serve.
Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel and serve.
Add ingredients to a glass filled with ice.
Combine the two ingredients in a tall glass with without ice.
Pour pucker and citrus vodka over ice into glass. Fill with Mountain Dew.
Pour the Jack Daniel s tennessee whiskey Southern Comfort and lemon juice into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with or add to taste the Mountain Dew and serve.
Add rum to glass then fill with root beer and Mountain Dew.
Fill glass w ice add vodka and mountain dew to taste and serve.

The first thing to do is add the ice. 4 large cubes work well. Then add the vodka. A good way to measure is to fill it almost to the top of the ice cubes. Add the Orange Juice until it is almost to the top of the glass and then add a little mountain dew. The more dew you add the less vodka taste you have. The oj also does a nice job of killing the vodka taste . Then enjoy.
Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Pour 2 shots of Blackhaus in glass. Add two ice cubes. Fill with Mountain Dew. Drop in a blackberry and add a mint leaf if available for presentation.
Pour Captain Morgan s Spiced Rum over crushed ice. Add Mountain Dew.
Pour the Mountain Dew in a glass then mix in the Jagermeister. A lot of the Jager will sink to the bottom causing a dark to green effect. Serve over ice.
Fill the glass with ice add the shot of Razz top off with Mountain Dew.
Pour schnapps into glass with ice fill with Mountain Dew.
Place two ice cubes into a 16 oz. cup. Add one shot of bacardi 151 proof rum and pour the mountain dew over the top.
Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.
Shake with a glassful of ice and pour unstrained into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.
Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a half slice of orange and serve.
Shake amaretto curacao juices and bitters with ice and strain into a collins glass. Top with a splash of club soda. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry and serve.
Pour casa noble reposado tequila creme de cassis and fresh lime juice into a glass with ice. Fill with ginger ale stir and serve with a wedge of lime on top.
Shake the Dr. McGillicuddy s vanilla schnapps and gin together in a cocktail shaker. Pour into an old fashioned or rocks glass and stir in the milk. Garnish with a cherry and serve.
Pour both ingredients together and mix well. Serve cold.

Frost the rim of a collins glass with salt. Pour the 4 ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake gently. Pour into the collins glass. Fill with 7 up and garnish with wheel of kiwi fruit and lemon twist. Serve.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.
Shake gin juice of lemon and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne stir and serve.
Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour liquor in a glass over ice. Fill with 7 Up add cherry juice for color.

strDrink: Diamond s Tweaked Cosmopolitan Martini recipe
strInstructions: Put all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until WELL chilled. Serve in chilled martini glass with sugared rim if possible. Garnish if desired with orange wedges peels.
Pour the white creme de menthe into a brandy snifter filled with crushed ice. Carefully pour the brandy over the back of a teaspoon in order to float it on top of the creme de menthe. Serve.
In a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Drink the Yoohoo down to the top of the label fill with rum and shake. Chocolate will seperate out leaving a diaper stain appearance.
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into an old fashioned glass half filled with ice cubes. Serve.
Fill a hurricane glass with ice add all ingredients. Shake or stir vigorously. Top with lemonade to taste and serve.
Mix. Pretend it s a martini. Plastic glasses are the best for this beast.
Mix all three liquors then fill with sprite. Garnish with lime and serve.
Mix all ingredients in a tall glass on the rocks.
Fill shot glass 2 3 full with Bailey s and then top it off with Crown Royal.
Take a large glass and fill with ice cubes. Add 1 part george dickel tennessee whiskey to 2 parts of mountain dew.
Pour into an ice filled highball glass and serve.
Fill glass 3 4 with ice. Add Tequila and Vodka fill glass with O.J.
Mix liquor and chocolate milk in a highball glass then top with whipped cream and cinnamon.
Pour the scotch bitters and ginger ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lime wedge.
Stir all ingredients together in an old fashioned glass 1 2 filled with ice cubes and serve.
Add your 2 shots of Skyy vodka into a highball glass followed by Diet Cherry Vanilla Dr.Pepper to the top. Sip or chug to enjoy.
Pour the Vodka Midori and Puucker over ice into a strainer shake then strain into glass with ice in it . Top off with Sweet and Sour and Sprite. Garnish with a cherry.
Use absolut citron or other citrus flavored vodka. Mix in highball glass and enjoy.
Shake all ingredients with ice cubes in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour the peach schnapps and Malibu coconut rum into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add cranberry and orange juices. Garnish the drink with 2 cherries and serve.
Shake all ingredients except mint with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the sprig of mint and serve.
Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Pour into a collins glass and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain over plenty of ice in a highball glass garnish with an orange slice and serve.

Fridge for at least 12 hours. . . Donnington Brainstorm is best at temperatures between 2 4 degrees centigrade. If the drink is too cold it will tend to be too bitter if it is too warm it will tend to be too sweet. At just the right temperature it should be light refreshing slightly peary and the alcohol taste minimal. . . Drink very carefully.

As the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the baileys and blue curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it s all gone.

Take a martini glass and set it on the table. Inside the martini glass put 1 2 ounce of curacao blue and 1 2 ounce of chartreuse green. Then place a 2 inch wide spacer on top of the martini glass so that you can place 3 cocktail glasses one on top of the other above the martini glass upside down . . . Inside a separate brandy glass put 1 and 1 2 ounces of white sambuca and heat with an open flame and allow to catch on fire. Once lit pour the sambuce over the top upside down cocktail glass and let the flaming liquid flow down once it reaches the bottom glass. . . Pour 1 ounce of galliano and 1 ounce of baileys into the martini glass where you already should have the 1 2 ounce of chartreuse and 1 2 ounce of curacao. Place a straw in the martini glass and the party drinking the drink sucks it dry and hopefully doesnt catch on fire. Enjoy.

Fill a cup 3 4 of the way with Pepsi or Diet Pepsi. Add in the whiskey until it s about an inch from the top. Stir for 5 seconds. Add in 3 4 spoonfuls of milk. Stir until it starts getting foamy at the top. The foam should rise a bit.

Combine all ingredients with 5 10 ice cubes in a blender. Blend until the ice is melted or close to it. The ice will melt soon anyway but leave the drink nice and cold. By the time the ice melts during blending it should have some nice head on it. Hence the foamy. Serve in glass of choice and enjoy.

Pour the melon liqueur light rum lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the grenadine into the center of the drink and serve.
Shake all ingredients and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with a teaspoon of sweet sherry and serve.
Stir ingredients together in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.
Pour gin and pernod into an aperitif glass fill with cold water add a twist of lemon peel and serve.
Serve on ice peach juice to taste.
Pour the gin into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale. Add half a lime first squeezed over then dropped in. Stir well and serve.
Shake and strain into an old fashioned glass three quarters filled with broken ice.
Pour the brandy madeira wine and triple sec into a mixing glass half filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Fill glass with ice. Add malibu then add pineapple juice. Stir.
Mix or shake all ingredients except grand marnier with cracked ice in a shaker. Pour or strain into large chilled wine glass or snifter. Float grand marnier on top.
Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Fill beer mug with 6 oz. of Vodka. Splash Apple Juice and Orange Juice in with it. Drink fast cause it tastes bad. Get ready it feels like a foot in the ass
Fill a glass with fernet branca. Drop in a splash of cream either whipped or foamed and serve.
Blend all ingredients and pour into a cocktail glass. Add a piece of edible dry ice.
Moisten the rim of the collins glass with a lime wedge and coat the rim with granulated sugar. Ice the glass and build the vodka and peach schnapps. Top with grapefruit juice.
Shake everything with ice strain into an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry if desired.
Pour into an old fashioned glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve.
Stir ingredients with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour ingredients into a collins glass filled with broken ice. Garnish with a slice of lime a sprig of mint and serve.
Add the 2 rums and vodka together in a beer mug. Then add the other 2 ingredients to it. Then top off the beer mug with lemonade.
Pour ingredients over a few ice cubes in order listed. Stir lightly.
Shake all ingredients except orange slice with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

Mix the tequila vodka banana liqueur and coconut milk together. Shake it well together with crushed ice and put it in an glass. Last pour the creme de menthe into the glass so that it sinks to bottom of the glass.
Chill all ingredients except 151 rum. Add to glass finishing with 151 on top.

strDrink: Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse recipe
strInstructions: Pour all liqueurs into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake until frosted. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes and add pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Stir and serve.
Add all ingredients to an old fashioned glass with without ice as desired. Stir lightly and serve.
Shake well in cracked ice strain into cocktail glasses serve with twists of lemon peel. Serves four.
Mix all ingredients in glass.
Pour all ingredients into a blender with one scoop half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass and serve.
In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Begin with vodka then blue curacao. After that add the lime liqueur. Mix in the grenadine. Stir gently. Fill up with sprite and put in some ice cubes.
Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Shake with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.
Shake everything with ice strain into an old fashioned glass.
Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice shake until completely then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.
Pour into a champagne saucer and serve.

Combine the gin strawberry liqueur lemon juice and sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Add soda water and garnish with a strawberry and a twist of lemon peel.
Shake and strain into an old fashioned glass half filled with broken ice. Add lemonade. Garnish with a lemon slice and sugar dipped raspberry and serve.
Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur into a mug of hot chocolate stir briefly and serve.
Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream.

Stir the lemon juice and sugar together in a large punch bowl until the sugar is dissolved. Add the tequila champagne and sauternes and stir well. Add one large block of ice. Garnish with melon balls cut out from a honeydew melon. Makes 36 6 ounce punch cups.
Stir all ingredients except cherry with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Blend ingredients in a bar blender with ice. Serve in margarita glasses.
Pour both ingredients over cracked ice in an old fashioned glass. Stir well and serve.
Fill the boston shaker with all the ingredients and a lot of ice cubes then shake untill your hand goes cold. Pour up in a highball glass and put a lemon slice on the edge.
Pour the raspberry vodka into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Fill with ginger beer add a splash of lime juice and serve.
Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon float the galliano on top of the drink and serve.
Shake all ingredients except carbonated water with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water stir and serve.
Shake with or without ice. Add a twist of lime.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail glass and stir. Decorate with a piece of pineapple and a cherry. Serve.
Stir together in a highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.
Pour brandy and sweet and sour mix into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled champagne and stir lightly. Add the slice of lemon and serve.
Shake all ingredients except champagne well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute slowly fill with champagne and serve.

In a shaker half filled with ice cubes combine the gin sugar and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.
Combine cognac sugar and lemon juice in shaker. Add ice and shake till chilled. Pour into champagne flute. Pour champagne over cognac concoction. Garnish with lemon curl.
Shake all ingredients except champagne well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute fill with champagne and serve.
Shake all ingredients except champagne with ice and strain into an ice filled goblet. Top with champagne and serve.
Served on ice in a rocks glass. May be served with a little whipped cream on top.
Pour into an ice filled old fashioned glass and serve.
Shake over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a large highball glass over crushed ice. Add pineapple chunks and serve.
Pour ingredients into a old fashioned glass over ice stir and serve.
Combine ingredients into a snifter and serve neat or add a small amount of ice if desired.

Pour all ingredients except grenadine into a shaker shake well and strain into a chilled large martini glass. Pour a drop of grenadine into the middle of the glass and let it fall to bottom. It will color the stem red. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.
Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Pour ingredients into a stainless steel shaker over ice shake until completely cold then strain into a chilled stemmed glass or Rocks glass filled with ice.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a maraschino cherry and serve.
Shake ingredients well with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime peel and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass. Add a dusting of lemon or orange sherbet on top and serve.
Pour the Frangelico hazelnut liqueur triple sec lime juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a highball glass and serve.
Pour the cognac and green chartreuse into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour all ingredients into glass over ice.
Stir and strain into a cordial glass. Garnish with a speared cherry and serve.
Shake and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a speared cherry or raspberry and serve.
Add glass half filled with chilled sparkling wine. Add grenadine and fill with bottled water. Drop in blueberries.
Pour each of the above into a tall bar glass. Shake with ice pour into a cocktail or martini glass and serve.
Place all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Can also be served on the rocks.
Add the 2 together and you ve got French Monkey Madness .
Add all ingredients to a Collin s glass with ice.
Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour the cognac into a brandy glass. Add irish cream and serve unstirred.
Pour orange curacao into a champagne flute add dark rum and fill with champagne preferably brut .
Stir port and cognac in a glass with about three ice cubes. Perfect if your port is too sweet or you aren t up for just cognac.
Pour the brandy and framboise into a mixing glass half filled with ice cubes. Stir well and strain into a champagne flute. Add the champagne and serve.
Stir all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Mix warm cointreau and vodka into a tumbler with a cube of sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved.
Pour the Grey Goose L Orange vodka into a highball glass over several ice cubes. Fill with Orangina orange soda stir briefly and serve.
Pour both ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.
Pour chambord into a wine glass filled with ice. Add sparkling water squeeze in a slice of lemon and orange and stir.

This is a layered drink mixed in two seperate steps. Begin by mixing 2 parts tequila chambord and cranberry w ice in shaker. Pour over ice in highball glass until just over half full. Next mix remaining 2 parts tequila triple sec and orange juice w ice in shaker. Slowly layer using back of spoon into top of highball glass. Garnish with orange and or lime wheel s .
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Stir everything with a spoon.

Add the vodka Chambord raspberry liqueur and Rose s watermelon cocktail infusion to a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.
Shake vigorously over ice and strain into a rocks glass.
Pour both ingredients into a cocktail or rocks glass and stir.
Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and lemon slices and serve.

strDrink: Fresh Berry and Wine Coulis recipe
strInstructions: Blend everything together until smooth. Put into freezer until nearly frozen and serve.

Cut up both melons and add to blender. Blend well and strain. Add Skyy melon vodka to a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Add about 2 4 oz of the blended melon juice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a melon ball for garnish and serve.
Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass garnish with an olive and serve.

Simply pour everything into a highball glass to the half filled with ice cubes and stir to a lovely ice blue colour. As a variation you can wait with the blue curacao and carefully add it to create blue cracks in the milk at the end.
Shake and pour into a v shape and garnish with cinnamon.
Pour the Frangelico brandy lemon juice and grenadine into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.
Mix the dark rum juice grenadine and Frangelico in a cocktail shaker with cracked ice. Pour into a chilled old fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.
Prepare mango fruit with rum and syrup in a blender with crushed ice. Strain into a large highball glass and fill with crushed ice. Squeeze in a lime wedge and serve.

Blend all ingredents in blender at highest speed. Consistancy of the mix should be semi thick not so thick that a spoon would stand by itself in the mix but not as thin as juice. If the mix is too thin add sherbet if too thick add equal amount of juice and alcohol. Pour into glass and place in freezer for 15 minutes.
Begin by crushing the 8 ice cubes in a blender. When ice is finely crushed add the remaining ingredients and blend for 45 seconds on blender s highest setting. Pour into glass and serve immediately.
Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a collins glass and garnish with a cherry.

Pour the vodka Galliano Cointreau lime juice maraschino liqueur and bitters into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.
Pour the rum triple sec and pineapple juice into a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a highball glass garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.
Mix tequila strawberry schnapps and Kool aid in a glass. Pour 7 up into mixture then put Pop Rocks on top to add fizzle.
Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.
Shake all ingredients except slices of lemon and lime with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.
Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker and strain into an old fashioned glass over ice cubes. Squeeze in an orange wedge garnish with a stemmed cherry and serve.
Fill highball glass with crushed ice. Add 2 oz. of Crown Royal Canadian Whiskey. Pour 6 oz Fresca Soda on top. Gently Stir. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge if on hand.
Mix the Fresca and the whisky and drink fast.
Start with ice. Add vodka to prefered level. Next add wanted amount of champagne and finish off the glass with ginger ale. Mix and drink.
Pour into glass stir and enjoy.
Add gin and bitters to highball glass with ice. Stir and fill with champagne. Garnish with lemon twist.
Stir ingredients together in a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass stir and serve.
Blend orange juice blue maui and vodka and pour in glass. Splash grenadine on top but do not stir in.
You just mix 1 3 vodka with 1 3 orange juice and 1 3 mountain dew in a beer mug.
Put in a cooler and shake it.
Fill highball glass with ice add the blue curacao add the tequila and finally for that yummy green color fill the glass with the orange juice.
Pour over ice.
Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry and serve.
Mix vodka and icewine in a shaker with ice shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the grapes at the bottom and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a frosted collins glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and pour into an old fashioned glass. Add Coca Cola and serve.
Stir together the absinthe and vodka in a mixing glass and strain into a highball glass half filled with ice. Fill the rest of the way up with Fresca soda. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.
Rim a collins glass with lemon and caster sugar and fill with ice. Shake ingredients strain into the glass and add 7 up. Garnish with a slice of orange and a green maraschino cherry and serve.
Mix all ingredients together in a highball glass and serve.
Blend lemonade and liquor with ice until slushy. Add a dash of cranberry juice and lime cordial. Serve and enjoy.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 cranberries and a slice of lime and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Garnish with a few drops of green creme de menthe and a rolled cookie and serve.

Pour the Absolut Citron vodka pineapple vodka and pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a collins glass 1 4 filled with crushed ice. Pour the RedRum rum on top. Put a slice of pineapple and a cherry on an umbrella and place on the side of glass as garnish.
Fill glass with ice. Squeeze lime wedge over ice. Add Captain Morgan. . Fill with root beer. Serve up and start sailin .
Shake all ingredients with ice strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Combine Kahlua vodka milk and chocolate in blender. Blend until frothy. Serve over ice in a large cocktail glass.
Pour all three ingredients into a cocktail glass stir and serve.
Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and slightly thick. Pour into a collins glass with a few ice cubes. Garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry. Add straws and serve.
Blend all ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old fashioned glass and serve.
Shake well and strain into a champagne saucer heaped with crushed ice.
Combine ingredients in a blender with three quarters of a cup of crushed ice. Pour into a london dock or sherry glass garnish with a light dusting of cinnamon and serve.
Blend everything together and serve garnished with a pineapple wedge if desired.
Blend all ingredients with 1 2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.
Blend everything except champagne until smooth. Transfer to glass and top with champagne.
Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Pour into a double cocktail glass garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.
Put all the ingredient into a blender. Blend at medium speed for about 20 seconds. Pour into an old fashioned glass.
Blend until smooth.
Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old fashioned glass and serve.
Blend vodka and ice cubes in a bar blender until slushy. Pour into a cocktail glass and fill with Red Bull. Stir.

Combine the liqueurs ice cream and cream in a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass rimmed with cinnamon sugar. Garnish with a cinnamon stick. Add a straw and serve.
Place all ingredients in blender with a cup of crushed ice and blend well. Serve in a margarita or hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry.
Pour the vodka melon liqueur blue curacao and lime juice into a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry and serve.
Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint add straws and serve.

Combine all ingredients in blender with plenty of ice slowly blending faster until at ICEE LIKE consistency. Check consistency until it s to your liking Serve in 4 5 Old Fashioned glasses. Garnish with a wedge of lime on side of glass and 1 skewered maraschino cherry...

Combine all ingredients except for the cherry in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute top with the cherry and serve.
Add all ingredients to a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend until puree consistency. Pour into a parfait glass garnish with a pineapple slice and serve.
Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

Add pieces of a chosen fruit syrup of that chosen fruit rums sugar lime juice and crushed ice to a blender and blend. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve. . . Popular fruits to choose bananas pineapples and strawberries.
Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1 3 cup of crushed ice. Blend on low for 5 seconds then on high until firm. Pour into a cocktail glass garnish with a slice of lemon or lime and serve.
Blend briefly in a double cocktail glass with a tablespoon of crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice and serve.
Blend. Add more or less milk to get a shake consistancy.
Mix all three ingredients together in a blender and blend until drink has the consistency of a good milk shake. Serve with a spoon and straw.
Blend everything and pour. Top with cherry.
Blend briefly with half a glassful of crushed ice in a wine goblet. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry and serve.
Blend ingredients except mint sprig in a bar blender with ice until smooth. Pour into glass and garnish with mint leaf.

Place salt in a saucer. Rub rim of a cocktail glass with lime wedge and dip glass into salt to coat rim thoroughly reserve lime. Pour tequila triple sec lime juice and crushed ice into a blender. Blend well at high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass.

In a blender add the can of limeade. Using the empty can measure the tequila and the triple sec and add to the blender. Blend adding ice cubes until the drink becomes slushy and holds in peaks. Serves 4.

Place both ingredients a cocktail shaker a cocktail glass and 2 almond stuffed olives in a freezer for approximately 4 hours. Remove when ready. Pour the gin and vermouth into the chilled cocktail shaker and shake well. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the 2 almond stuffed olives and serve.

Blend all ingredients except pineapple stick with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old fashioned glass add the pineapple stick and serve.
Shake and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a speared melon ball and lime slice and serve with a short straw.
Mix all ingredients in a blender with enough ice to freeze. Serve in a tall glass with a lime twist garnish.
Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old fashioned glass and serve.
Blend everything except mint and pour. Garnish with mint sprigs.
Blend alcohol with ice cream. Serve in a frosted glass.
Add all liquid ingredients into mixer. Add vanilla ice cream and mix. Add more ice cream till desired texture.
Blend ingredients until smooth.
Combine Kool Aid orange mix sugar and Bacardi O orange rum in a blender with ice. Blend until smooth and frosty pour into a tall glass and serve.

In blender place about 8 ice cubes 2 oz. Grand Marnier and about 1 4 cup vanilla ice cream. Blend until smooth. Add a drop or two of orange food coloring for stronger color. Pour into a Hurricane glass and garnish with an orange slice.
Pour all ingredients into a blender and blend. Strain into a margarita glass rimmed with coarse salt garnish with a wheel of lime and serve.
Mix with shaved ice in blender serve in wine glass. . . Variations Substitute several large ripe strawberries for the peach.
Pour all ingredients into a blender with 1 4 cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth and transfer to a tulip glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.
Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice.
In blender add 2 scoops of ice add all ingredents blend. Add ice as needed. Pour into glass serve.
Place Irish Cream strawberry liqueur and grenadine in a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into cocktail glass and fill with 7 Up.

Mix the vodka tropical blue Sourz pineapple juice and lime juice in a shaker and shake. Crush some ice and pour it in to a highball glass then add the mix from the shaker. Garnish with some pineapple and then dash some Monin Blue Curacao Syrup so it runs down through the crushed ice. Serve.

Mix the limeade Cointreau and tequila in a mixing glass. Add 2 cups of ice to a blender and add the strawberries and tequila mixture. Blend until smooth thin with tequila if necessary . Serve in a margarita glass.
Put six scoops ice cream in blender follow with alcohols. When blended add ice and push to bottom of blender with rest of ice cream. Makes two big cups.
Blend briefly with a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double cocktail glass.
Pour ingredients over finely shaven ice in a parfait glass and stir well. Garnish with a slices of fruit and serve.
Place ingredients into electric blender blend until smooth.
Combine ingredients in a blender until smooth. Pour into a glass garnish with a fresh strawberry and serve.
Pour the rum and lemon juice and sugar into a champagne saucer with some shaved ice. Stir well. Garnish with 4 strawberries sliced or otherwise and serve.
Blend all ingredients together. Either serve immediately or freeze for later use. If freezing for later take out of freezer approximately 45 minutes before serving.
Pour all ingredients over finely shaven ice in a margarita glass and serve.
Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass filled with finely shaven ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.
Mix ingredients in a blender.
Put all together in blender and blend until smooth.
Shake ingredients with ice strain into a martini glass and garnish with a strawberry.
Combine all ingredients in glass with ice except the grenadine. Add the grenadine last by pouring slowly over a spoon. Garnish with lemon if so desired.
Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.
Mix ingredients together in a shaker with ice. Strain into a glass with ice.

Pour the rum creme de cacao and one cup of crushed ice into a blender. Add the fruit liqueur and peeled fruit to your choosing use the same flavor for both and blend well. Pour into an exotic glass hurricane or equivalent and serve.
Add all ingredients to a blender and blend well. Pour over finely shaven ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a slice of banana and serve.
Drain syrup from the fruit cocktail. Mix fruit and cinnamon with 4 ice cubes in a blender. Add whisky according to taste. Let blend for about 2 1 2 minutes at high setting.
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and pour into a champagne saucer filled with crushed ice. Serve with a short straw.

Pour the Midori melon liqueur peach schnapps Smirnoff vodka Bacardi rum Gordon s dry gin and Malibu rum into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Add orange juice and pineapple juice. Shake well. Strain into a collinsl glass 1 4 filled with crushed ice. Add a dash of cranberry juice garnish with a slice of orange and serve.
Fill highball glass with ice. Pour curacao over ice then fill with milk.
Mix ingredients in order stir enjoy.
Add the tequila triple sec sour mix and fruit choose one fruit to a blender with one cup of crushed ice. Blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

Place ice cubes into the glass. Pour over measure of gin followed by the dry vermouth. Fill to desired level with orange juice. Gently pour in dashes of blue curacao so that about 2 3 of the orange turns green. Pour the dashes of grenadine to turn bottom of the drink red. Serve with a straw.
Pour the rum creme de bananes creme de cassis and orange juice into a blender with half a cup of crushed ice. Blend well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Combine all ingredients pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

Pour a shot of Mango Rum pour it in a glass. Then pour a shot of coconut rum pour it in to your glass. Fill the rest of the cup up with about 4 oz. of Melon Gaterade and stir. Add fruit if you like I personally like adding lime.

Fill blender 1 2 to 3 4 full with ice and add strawberries pieces of watermelon and slices of star fruit. Last add rum and pina colada mix. Blend until smooth and garnish with a slice of star fruit and an umbrella.
Fill glass with ice and add all the ingredients mix well. Add straw and garnish if required.
Pour curacao over ice in a tumbler. Add raspberry cordial and lemonade at the same time so that the combined effect mixes the drink. Tastes like the lollies called Fruit Tingles.

Pour the blue curacao and vodka over the ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and at the same time add the dash of cordial. Be sure not to go overboard with the cordial otherwise it overpowers the fruit tingle effect.
Pour ingredients into a highball glass 2 3 filled with ice cubes. Stir extremely well and serve.
Pour ingredients shake with ice and serve with a straw. Garnish with an orange slice if desired.
Shake everything with ice and pour into glass.

Pour the DeKuyper sour apple and watermelon pucker into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Add the peach schnapps and Malibu rum and shake well. Strain into a highball glass 3 4 filled with ice cubes. Add the cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.
Shake and strain into an old fashioned glass half filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Pour the Bacardi Raz and Stolichnaya raspberry vodka Stoli Razberi followed by the orange juice and Red Bull into a highball glass. Splash with cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of orange with a cherry on a pick and serve.
Pour all ingredients over ice in a collins glass and serve.
Mix all ingredient together in a blender with ice. Add more ice for more consistency.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

Drop 3 regular sized ice cubes in a collins glass. Pour cranberry raspberry juice in then orange juice then pour in the 99 Apples or 99 Oranges leaving which ever flavor you like the most last. Stir gently and wait until the drink is sufficiently chilled before serving. You may want to change ratios depending on your tastes and sensitivity to alochol.

Pour the banana liqueur dark rum Midori melon liqueur peach schnapps creme de cassis and grenadine into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with pineapple juice garnish with a slice of pineapple and serve.
Stir ingredients together in an old fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

Mix ingredients in a martini shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into glass of choice martini or margarita preferably. This really does taste like fruity pebbles. The above ought to make 1 large drink or two medium sized drinks.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Add all ingredients to a blender blend until smooth. Pour into a large hurricane glass. Garnish with maraschino cherries and serve.
Add some ice into a beer mug. Add 4 oz. of Everclear 6 oz. of strawberry margarita mix and 8 oz. of sprite to the mug. Stir and enjoy.
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour ingredients over ice in a large glass.
Add Sour Apple Pucker and Triple Sec to a cocktail glass. Add lime or lemon lime Kool aid. Stir and serve. Ice optional.
Add orange or citrus vodka to tall glass. Pour in lemonade OJ and orange soda. Stir and drink.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a double rocks glass.

strDrink: Fu Me Like A Beast recipe
strInstructions: Combine all ingredients except 151 shake well with ice pour into highball glass and top it off with bacardi 151.
Mix in shaker over cracked ice pour into highball glass with ice and enjoy.

strDrink: Fuck Me By The Pool recipe
strInstructions: Start with one part Blue Maui add one part Peach schnapps and finish it up with orange juice.
Mix everything well and serve over ice.

strDrink: Fuck Me Like An Animal recipe
strInstructions: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and serve.
Pour triple sec light rum and tequila into a highball glass over ice. Stir together then add orange juice and ginger ale. Serve.
Pour the lemon vodka peach schnapps and triple sec into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Add the juices and stir vigorously. Top with extra grapefruit juice if desired and serve.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with cherries.
Fill a collins glass or pint glass half way with Coca cola. Add the Jack Daniel s Tennessee Whiskey and Jagermeister. Add the rest of the Coke and serve.

Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

First begin with 2 shots of vodka and triple sec in your glass. Then add 1 shot of peach brandy and Malibu coconut rum. Add 1 splash of lemon and cranberry juices. Next add the 2 splashes of orange juice and top with 2 of pineapple juice. Mix well and serve on ice and you have a drink that everyone can enjoy.
Mix together kahlua schnapps vodka ice cream and cola until blended. Fill with milk.
Squeeze lemons into blender and blend all ingredients together. Coat the rims of the glasses with sugar and pour in the mixture.
Mix ingredients in cup.
Pour ingredients in equal parts into a shot glass stir and serve.

Pour the Jeremiah Weed whiskey into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Add the blue curacao triple sec and Southern Comfort peach liqueur and add a can of tonic water. Shake vigorously despite the building pressure. Shake until much of the carbonation from the tonic water subsides and creates a petillent clear teal beverage. Pour over a minimal amount of ice in a collins glass and serve.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and place above ingredients. Shake and fill a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon and enjoy the original Arnold Palmer with a twist of the south
Pour both ingredients into an old fashioned glass stir briefly and serve.
Pour each ingredient into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a cocktail glass and serve.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass and stir. Add a straw and serve.
Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.
Pour all contents in glass over cubed ice and mix together.

Pour the apricot brandy DeKuyper Peachtree schnapps Kahlua coffee liqueur and sour mix into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a 10 12 oz highball glass. Fill with 7 up. Stir and serve.
Pour above ingredients into an ice filled rocks glass and serve.
Tilt a brandy snifter and pour in the amaretto. While still tilting add grand marnier. Gently roll snifter in the tilted position set upright and serve.

Add the three rums and the midori in highball glass with ice. Add a little sour mix for flavor and fill the rest with pineapple juice. It s a nice light green color. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Combine with ice in a highball glass and serve.

Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with coconut flakes.
Add absolut kurant and sprite to a cocktail glass. Mix in the grenadine syrup and add the cherry cola. Serve. Add a dash of lime for a slightly different taste.

Pour the rums blue curacao grenadine and lime juice into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime with an almond embedded in it. Pour the dash of coconut rum to finish and serve.

Pour the peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the cola stir well and serve.

Add the shots and fill the rest with ginger ale lemonade and orange juice to taste.
Pour Arrow peach schnapps into an ice filled highball glass. Add Bacardi white rum fill with Sunny Delight california style and serve.

Add everything to a highball glass with ice.
Pour the blue curacao raspberry liqueur triple sec and everclear into a highball glass 3 4 filled with ice cubes. Top with 7 up and stir well.

Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Strain into an old fashioned or highball glass filled with ice cubes and serve.

Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes and serve.
Pour the Midori melon liqueur and peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice stir and serve.
Add all ingredients to a highball glass filled with ice.
Build over ice in a highball glass.
Shake with ice strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

Orange juice last stir and enjoy
Pour peach schnapps into ice filled collins glass. Fill with orange juice to taste and stir to combine.
Pour all liquids over ice and shake. Pour into highball glass and garnish with either an orange wheel or a cherry. Can also be made frozen.

Pour coconut rum and peach schnapps over ice in glass and fill remaining with pineapple juice. Use as much ice as you like as it will determine how much pineapple juice is used. I use no more than half the glass with ice. . . You can also blend everything including ice together to make a smooth frothy version of this drink. It tends to make it a bit more acidic but is a viable option.
Pour all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.
Build over ice in a highball glass and serve.
Combine ingredients in an old fashioned rocks glass. Drink like a shot.
Pour over ice stir.
Build over ice in a highball glass.
Pour both ingredients into an old fashioned glass and stir.

strDrink: Fuzzy Screw Against the Wall recipe
strInstructions: Pour the vodka and peach schnapps into a highball glass and stir. Fill with orange juice. Top with galliano and serve.

Pour the tequila peach schnapps and orange juice into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a highball glass. Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink.
Fill glass with ice add liqueur then fill with pineapple juice. Stir.
Mix ingredients together and top with ice.

Fill the glass to the top with crushed ice. . . Pour one shot of Midori into the glass. Squeeze the lime so that the juice goes into the glass and add 3 mint leaves crushing them a little bit. And a pinch of sugar. . . Pour in the cloudy apple juice and then add schweppes slowly so that it goes to the bottom . . . Garnish with a lime wedge and or suger rim around the glass.
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a sour glass.

mix everything in a highball over ice adding the lemonade lastl

Mix all the alcohol together using a whisk then add the banana chunks and chocolate chips to the alcohol. Then put the lemon on the side of the glass.
